comments:

CommonarchiveFactory factory = CommonarchiveFactoryImpl.getActiveFactory();
EARFile anEarFile = factory.openEARFile(anEarFilePath);
anEarFile.getDeploymentDescriptor();
anEarFile.rollUpRoles(); // Got exception

We will give this priority tomorrow

Fixed...

Added logic to the resolver to register local copy only if it can be found at
registration time.

The JUnit "org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.archive.test.WarFileTests" covers this failure
executed as a headless non-plugin junit.
